rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Castle Cay enters the battlefield, each player chooses a nonbattle, nonland permanent they control, then sacrifices the rest.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {W}.
{T}: Exile target nonland permanent if its controller controls another nonland permanent that shares a type with it. Activate only as a sorcery.
